title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The Battlefield staff has developed materials for educators to enhance their teaching of the American Civil War. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips There is no better way to experience history than in the places where it happened. Field trip topics range from soldier life to environmental history. Here you will discover field trip subjects, availability, and more. All Field Trips     Traveling Trunks Bring the Battlefield to you through the traveling trunk program. The trunks are designed to be used in the classroom as a teaching aid and are appropriate for a variety of ages, learning styles, and learning abilities. All Traveling Trunks
